templates.template: {X} gives {Y} drinks if they answer correctly: {Z}

Z: What is the capital of France? (Paris)
In what year did World War II begin? (1939)
How many days does February have in a leap year? (29)
What is the largest planet in the solar system? (Jupiter)
Who painted the Mona Lisa? (Leonardo da Vinci)
What is the longest river in the world? (Nile)
How many bones does an adult human body have? (206)
What is the highest mountain in the world? (Everest)
What gas do we mainly breathe? (Oxygen)
How many hearts does an octopus have? (3)
In what year did man land on the moon? (1969)
What is the capital of Australia? (Canberra)

forget to pay for a round
